title: Patch 6.4?
body:
Hallo,

ich dachte immer, dass alle 14 Tage am Mittwoch jeweils ein neuer Patch kommt :)

Weiß jemand wann 6.4 kommt? 

Lg

FireHawk{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: der patch ist immer donnerstags so um 2 oder 3 in der fr√ºh^^
yay, endlich kann ich bald {{item:3512}} wieder bauen <3

Good news everyone - Server maintenance for our next patch, Patch 6.4, has been scheduled!

On February 25th at 3:00 am PST for NA, 2:00 UK time for EUW, and 3:00 CET for EUNE, servers will go down for maintenance and the 6.4 patch will be applied.

Here's  NA| version of the  Network Operations maintenance announcement:

    "On 02/25/16, starting at, 01:30 Pacific Time (09:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.4. At 03:00 Pacific time (11:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours."

Be sure to check your particular servers status page for your region's specific 6.4 maintenance times:

NA, EUW, EUNE, BR, TR, LAS, LAN, RU, OCE

I'll keep you updated as more information on what the patch contains and patch notes become available. In the mean time, feel free to check the  [ 6.4 PBE content ] for a tentative look at what is coming in the patch!
